item.name: XR6 Replace config_with_snapshot
XR6 Replace config_with_snapshot Setup
permit XR models
blacklist opencofig for XR
mount IOS XR netconf R1
check status connected R1

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Not connected yet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: check uniconfig available R1

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Uniconfig for node not availableyet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: mount IOS XR netconf R2
check status connected R2

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Not connected yet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: check uniconfig available R2

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Uniconfig for node not availableyet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

item.name: create interface on R1
check interface exists on config R1
create interface on R2
check interface exists on config R2
check nonexisting interface on oper R1
check nonexisting interface on oper R2
XR6 Replace config_with_snapshot Teardown
delete snapshot
unmount R1
check unmounted netconf R1
unmount R2
check unmounted netconf R2
Tests
Replace config_with_snapshot one-router
create snapshot on R1 one router
replace config with snapshot on R1 one router
check nonexisting interface on config R1 one router
check interface exists on config R2 one router
check nonexisting interface on oper R1 one router
check nonexisting interface on oper R2 one router
Replace config_with_snapshot all-routers
create snapshot on R1 and R2 all routers
replace config with snapshot on R1 and R2 all routers
check nonexisting interface on config R1 all routers
check nonexisting interface on config R2 all routers
check nonexisting interface on oper R1 all routers
check nonexisting interface on oper R2 all routers
Replace config_with_snapshot bad-input
create snapshot on R1 and R2 bad input
replace config with snapshot on R1 and R3 bad input

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["output"]["error-message"]).to.eql("Uniconfig nodes [Uri [_value=R3]] do not exist in snapshot snapshot1.");

item.name: check interface exists on config R1 bad input
check interface exists on config R2 bad input
check nonexisting interface on oper R1 bad input
check nonexisting interafce on oper R2 bad input
